c74object.name: hoa.2d.optim~
c74object.description: hoa.2d.optim~ weights the circular harmonics signals depending on the ambisonic optimization. It can be basic for no optimization, maxRe or inPhase.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: decomposition-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

objarg.name: optimization-mode
objarg.description: The optimization mode can be basic for no optimization, maxRe or inPhase (default).

method.name: basic
method.digest: Set the optimization mode to basic, does not apply any optimization.
method.description: Set the optimization mode to basic. This is particulary suitable when the listener is ideally placed at the center of the loudspeaker arrangement, or for diffused soundfields.

method.name: maxRe
method.digest: Set the optimization mode to maxRe.
method.description: Set the optimization mode to maxRe. This is particulary suitable when the audience is confined at the center of the restitution area.

method.name: maxRe
method.digest: Set the optimization mode to maxRe.
method.description: Set the optimization mode to maxRe. This is particulary suitable when the audience covers all of the restitution area.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Array of circular harmonic signals to be optimized.
method.description: Array of circular harmonic signals to be optimized.
